synopsis: After witnessing a murder, a meek family man must summon his courage when he finds himself on the wrong side of a notorious gangster.

synopsis: Following the untimely death of his father, a young man begins to reconnect with his family while uncovering some difficult truths.

title: Kaccha Limboo
synopsis: After a misfit teen is caught forging his parents' signatures, he flees responsibility by running away from home and befriending a group of slum kids.

synopsis: A prostitute who is down on her luck gets caught in the middle of an elaborate scheme orchestrated by two local politicians.

title: Rivaaz
synopsis: In a village where girls are auctioned off rather than married, a man falls in love with a girl who is about to face the bidders.

synopsis: An evil demon who traded his freedom for immortality lures Chhota Bheem and his friends to the city of Sonapur with tales of hidden treasure.

synopsis: A boy from an orthodox Brahmin family is unable to marry the Christian girl with whom he's in love, due to objections from his father.

synopsis: When Shankar, who performs on the road with partner Chanchal and elephant Appu, falls for a Russian circus performer, jealousies and conflicts arise.

Six friends decide to undertake a grueling mountain trek, only to find that the difficulties in store for them are not merely physical.

synopsis: When one of the three men in the life of a woman who was forced into a loveless marriage is killed, she becomes the prime suspect.

title: Hope Aur Hum
synopsis: A multigenerational household navigates daily life, evolving relationships and clashes between old and new mindsets in this light family drama.

title: Singapore

synopsis: Armed with a high IQ and uncanny powers of deduction, agent Raghav Sinha helps the Crime Branch Special Unit solve the city's most baffling cases.

synopsis: An extraordinary sense of smell gives a crime investigator unique insight into solving mysteries, but his gift takes a toll on his personal life.

synopsis: From teen lovers defying social and religious taboos to a student falling for her teacher, these stories explore joy and heartache in modern romance.

synopsis: As a crazed killer blazes a trail of blood through an anxious city, a hardened cop aims to take him down by any means in this remake of “Dirty Harry.”

title: Katputtli
synopsis: While walking down a road, a woman suddenly forgets who she is -- and wonders why her dress is blood-stained and her pockets are full of money.

title: Bandie
synopsis: Heirless Maharaj Brajbhan leaves his throne to his cousin Vikram, but when Brajbhan's wife, Badi Rani, finally conceives, Vikram plots to destroy her.

synopsis: Facing mounting pressure from her family to get married, filmmaker Ruchika Muchhala digs deep into the culture of arranged marriage in today's India.
